attractions.name: City Park
attractions.description: A beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas.
attractions.caption: City Park Main Entrance

attractions.name: Historical Museum
attractions.description: Explore our town's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

attractions.name: Downtown Plaza
attractions.description: The heart of our community with shops, restaurants, and seasonal events.

attractions.name: Riverwalk Trail
attractions.description: Scenic 5-mile trail along the river, perfect for walking and biking.

attractions.name: Community Arts Center
attractions.description: Hosting performances, art exhibits, and workshops for all ages.

attractions.name: Farmers Market
attractions.description: Fresh local produce and handmade goods every Saturday morning.

attractions.name: Sports Complex
attractions.description: State-of-the-art facilities for baseball, soccer, and community events.

attractions.name: Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: 20 acres of themed gardens showcasing native and exotic plants.
